Hello Alex,

It was great meeting you recently, and I appreciate your interest in the work we do at Serenity Path.

What we do
Serenity Path is an addiction-recovery center that takes a holistic, evidence-based approach to care. Our core programs include:
• Residential treatment for people who need intensive, structured support at the start of recovery.
• An Intensive Outpatient Program that combines group therapy, individual counseling, and peer support while allowing participants to stay engaged with everyday life.
• Stand-alone outpatient services such as individual counseling, family therapy, and relapse-prevention workshops.
• Skills-building sessions that draw on Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, 12-Step facilitation, mindfulness practices, and family-based interventions.

Impact so far
Approximately three-quarters of the individuals who completed a primary course of care with us over the past year have maintained sobriety. We attribute that outcome to combining strong clinical practices with continuing support after formal treatment ends.

Ways to collaborate
Given your software background, there may be exciting opportunities to collaborate. For example, we are exploring:
• Enhancements to our patient portal and progress-tracking dashboards
• Mobile prompts for mindfulness and craving-management exercises
• Data analysis on anonymized outcome metrics to refine our programs

If any of that sparks ideas, let me know. I can also share a brief slide deck that gives a deeper look at our methods and impact. Happy to schedule a short call or virtual coffee to discuss further.

Thanks again for reaching out, and I look forward to hearing your thoughts.

Warm regards,
John
